NTR detected
Well said Null, I try not to let anything bother me, and I dont judge anyone for a fetish either.

I just want to clarify, I have no direct issue with either NTR (I used to but...) or furry; there are as many "preferences" as there are human beings, which is what makes life interesting. On top of that, when done well, just about anything can be "good" depending on one's sensibilities. Lastly, as the poster below me said, these are characters; no matter how big a fan you are of a character, it's ultimately out of your control how he, she, and/or it are used in a doujinshi. What you can control, to some extent, are your emotions. Try not to let things bother you, and if you don't like a work, that's fine. If others do, that's fine. It's all subjective, and it SHOULD be all in good fun. But it's up to all of US to keep things cool. So just, y'know, chill, I guess. I dunno. :/
Guys don't take it so seriously. You need to learn emotional detachment. They are only characters after all, to be used how ever the artist wants, so take it with a grain of salt.
